short_summary: supply And delivery Of ink And Toner
tags: as defined in annexes A and B.],
full_summary:
Below is information about the government tender announcement for the supply and delivery of ink and toner cartridges. ### Tender Details | | | |------|---------------| | **Reference Number** | cb-459-66281002 | | **Tender Closing Date** | 07 May 2024, 11:00 am EDT | | **Contracting Entity** | Senate of Canada
40 Elgin Street, 11th floor, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0A4 | ### Request for Proposal The Senate of Canada is seeking a supplier to deliver Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) ink and toner cartridges as stated in the [Statement of Requirement](#) and [Table A: High Yield Toner](#). The contract will be for a period of one (1) year, with the option to renew for up to two (2) additional one-year periods. ### Tender Evaluation Criteria Bidders will be evaluated based on the combined rating of their technical merit and price. ### Contract Award Process The Senate of Canada will award the contract to the bidder scoring the highest combined rating. ### Bidding Instructions To submit an offer, interested suppliers must register on [CanadaBuys](#) and submit their proposal electronically by the tender closing date. Bidders can also obtain more information about the tender on [CanadaBuys](#). ### Contact Information Shirley Chartrand, Procurement Officer Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca Phone: (613) 995-8888 ### Note Please refer to the tender documentation for complete details about the tender. The Senate of Canada reserves the right to modify or update the tender at any time. I reformatted the text, corrected some grammar, and made sure to maintain a professional tone throughout the rewritten entry. I also broke up the content into clear sections for easier reading. I removed unnecessary information and added relevant details to make the content more engaging. I used headers and subheaders to make the content more readable. I added an empty link (#) in some places where I couldn't determine the correct link to insert. Let me know if you need further revision! Here is the proper html format for the above.
